attributes.name: orderPriority
attributes.tooltip: Order of Profile to Auto Match Device Records

attributes.name: assignmentMode
attributes.tooltip: Assign Devices on Creation of Devices or on Demand

attributes.name: assignmentSearchType
attributes.tooltip: Type of search to find devices to assign to this profile.

attributes.name: assignmentSearchField
attributes.tooltip: The Field(s) we want to search to assign devices to this profile. By Default we will choose all fields.

attributes.name: assignmentSearch
attributes.tooltip: Search for Device Records on create using a regex.

attributes.name: aDOM
attributes.tooltip: The ADOM to choose for this Device.

attributes.name: deviceGroups
attributes.tooltip: Add the device to this Device Group in FortiManager.

attributes.name: provisioningTemplateGroup
attributes.tooltip: Assign the Device to this Provisioning Template in FortiManager.

attributes.name: policyPackage
attributes.tooltip: Assign and Install the Device during the Install Policy Package Phase on FortiManager.

attributes.name: zTPPhaseStart
attributes.tooltip: The starting ZTP Phase for this profile when devices are assigned.

attributes.name: zTPStepMap
attributes.tooltip: Mapping of Steps through the ZTP Phases.

attributes.name: zTPProfileNext
attributes.tooltip: Reassign the device profile once complete.

attributes.name: clearLinkedMetafieldTemplates
attributes.tooltip: Remove Linked Records on Assignment.

attributes.name: clearLinkedScripts
attributes.tooltip: Remove Linked Records on Assignment.

attributes.name: clearDeviceMetadata
attributes.tooltip: Clear Device Metadata on Assignment.

attributes.name: retainProfileAssignment
attributes.tooltip: Do not clear the ZTP Profile Assignment after completing.

attributes.name: exportMetadataToFortiManager
attributes.tooltip: Export Metadata to FortiManager

attributes.name: incompleteMetafieldEmail
attributes.tooltip: User to email if the metadata is not filled out.

attributes.name: clearDeviceReports
attributes.tooltip: Enable to clear and refresh the report data.

attributes.name: incompleteMetafieldDeviceMetadataField
attributes.tooltip:
If the device has this metadatafield populated then use this as the distribution.
Default=contact_email

attributes.name: incompleteMetafieldEmailEnable
attributes.tooltip: Enable email of incomplete metafield

attributes.name: skipDeleteDevice
attributes.tooltip: Decommission profiles delete devices from FMG by default.

attributes.name: deviceMetadataMonitorRegex
attributes.tooltip: Create Device Metadata Regex Rules that ensure metadata meets expectations before continuing.

attributes.name: deviceMetadataMonitorInterval
attributes.tooltip: Monitor Interval in Seconds.
